question_text: You're advising a user on the benefits of modular batteries. Select two key advantages of using modular batteries.
answer_options: They require special diagnostic software to monitor
They can be quickly replaced without disassembly
They extend battery life by design
Users can carry spares for quick swapping
They must be serviced by certified technicians
correct_answer: They can be quickly replaced without disassembly
Users can carry spares for quick swapping
explanation: Modular batteries are designed for quick user access, allowing easy replacements and the option to carry spares.
